coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A small embroidered tag informs you that this apron was made by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: Chef's apron
coreAttributes.description: A traditional chef's apron made of thick cotton, with three large pockets.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on a chef apron and [npc.verb(tie)] it around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the chef apron over [npc2.namePos] head and [npc.verb(tie)] it around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the chef apron over [npc2.namePos] head and [npc.verb(tie)] it tightly around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] chef apron before taking it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc2.namePos] chef apron before taking it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] at [npc2.namePos] chef apron's knot before roughly pulling it off.
